name: Three-Headed Cobra
movement: 40 feet walking speed, 30 feet swimming speed
description: The Three-Headed Cobra is a formidable creature with three heads, each capable of delivering a venomous bite. It is large in size, agile, and possesses a sleek, scaly body.
memorable: Its three heads allow it to attack multiple times and provide it with enhanced awareness and resilience against control effects.
goals: Typically aggressive, it seeks to ambush prey and defend its territory using its speed and biting attacks.
relations: Related to other giant snakes and cobras, could be encountered alongside venomous wildlife.
environment: Commonly found in swamps, jungles, or any area with access to both land and water.
strengths: Quick and highly reactive, boasting a multiattack feature that allows it to strike multiple times in one turn.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma, limiting its problem-solving abilities and interactions outside combat.
attacks: Delivers three venomous bite attacks in a single turn, with a significant reach and the potential for ongoing poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Reactive Heads ability grants it additional reactions for opportunity attacks, increasing its threat during combat.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 10 feet, allowing it to sense its surroundings without relying on sight.
skills: Has a decent perception skill, enhancing its ability to notice hidden creatures or objects.
additional_information: Gains advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks due to having three heads.
Resilient against being blinded or charmed thanks to its multiple heads.
Always has one awake head, providing it with protection during rest.
Engages in opportunistic strikes as foes attempt to flee.
